A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\,\, but ultimately kinda disappointing. After so many dieing at the end of \"Rogue One\" and Han getting killed at the end of \"The Force awakens\" I had hoped that \"The Last Jedi\" would have a more positive upbeat story line. But sadly Star Wars is becoming like everything Else\, Drama and tragedy. It's like the writers don't even know what happiness is anymore \, so how can they even write a story about it?  :/
